name: Alien run (itch) (PilarCarrera)
description:
Title: Alien run

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: This game consist on an alien jumping through platforms and trying to get as much coins as possible.

Instructions: up arrow to jump, enter to restart

Game Design Team: Pilar Carrera Monterde - Game Designer
